pro rata.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a payment or share that is pro rata is calculated according to how much of something is used, how much work is done etc
pro rata.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Fees are calculated on a pro rata basis.
pro rata.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a pro rata payment or share in something is calculated according to exactly how much of something is used, how much work is done etc
pro rata.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The residents here pay more than their pro rata share of taxes.
Fees for longer or shorter courses are calculated on a pro rata basis.
